actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on International Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on International Security, Proliferation and Federal Services

official_title: A bill to amend title 37, United States Code, to authorize members of the uniformed services to participate in the Thrift Savings Plan, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for participation of members of the uniformed services in the Thrift Savings Plan for Federal employees. Authorizes military personnel to contribute to the Thrift Savings Fund out of military basic pay in an amount of up to: (1) five percent of such pay, if the member has less than five years of retirement-creditable service; or (2) ten percent, if the member has at least five years of such service.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 37, United States Code, to authorize members of the uniformed services to participate in the Thrift Savings Plan, and for other purposes.
